properties.name: app.security.entrypoint.requiresauth
properties.description: Configures the paths that will be required to have authentication. (e.g. '/**')

properties.name: app.security.entrypoint.login
properties.description: Configures the path required for login. (e.g. '/api/auth/login')

properties.name: app.security.entrypoint.refresh
properties.description: Configures the path to obtain a refresh token/ (e.g. '/api/auth/token')
